mapper.select: select c.cityimg, city, rContent,c.iata from product a join recommandProduct b on a.productnum = b.productnum join airport c on a.arrive = c.iata order by RECOMMANDNUM
select sale,city,cityimg,iata from (select a.sale,b.city,b.cityimg,b.iata from product a join airport b on a.arrive = b.iata order by a.sale desc) where rownum<=#{rownum}
